'''Uno ''Minecraft''''' is a spin-off of the [[Wikipedia:Uno (card game)|card game Uno]] by Mattel. The deck features 112 cards with ''Minecraft'' [[Character|characters]] and [[Mob|mobs]], with one card being called the "Creeper card" which is unique to Uno as it forces a player to draw three cards.<ref name=":0">[https://m.service.mattel.com/us/Technical/productDetail?prodno=FPD61&siteid=27 UNO™ Minecraft] mattel.com</ref> Like regular Uno, 2-10 players are required and the recommended player age is 7 years old and older.  

The card game can be purchased in either a regular card box<ref name=":0" /> or in a storage tin.<ref name=":1">[https://m.service.mattel.com/us/Technical/productDetail?prodno=HJC88 UNO™ Minecraft (storage tin)] mattel.com</ref>
